title: Runner, "Spring", 1940–70
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, linen, viscose, metal, lurex, plastic
Technique: handwoven with wide strips of printed cotton incorporated in an open plain weave; stitched to a sheet of plastic
inscribed: Printed paper Trude Guermonprez label attached. Also two cardboard handwritten tags, "'SPRING' TRUDE GUERMONPREZ" and "TAO 34 GUERMONPREZ SPRING".
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A woven fabric printed with a row of bare trees in yellow and light purple on white; cut into strips and used as the weft in a plain weave fabric; stitched to clear plastic sheeting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Runner, "Spring", 1940–70.
1940–70. Medium: cotton, wool, linen, viscose, metal, lurex, plastic
Technique: handwoven with wide strips of printed cotton incorporated in an open plain weave; stitched to a sheet of plastic. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-35.
